Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix critical document extraction and multi-document querying bugs

1. Fix chunk extraction bug in create_chunks.py \(line 32\)
   - Changed default token_chunk_size from MAX_TOKEN_CHUNK_SIZE to 2000
   - Previously: chunk_to_be_created = 50000 / 50000 = 1 chunk only
   - Now: chunk_to_be_created = 50000 / 2000 = 25 chunks per document
   - This ensures full document content is extracted, not just titles

2. Fix multi-document querying in QA_integration.py
   - Scale search_k based on number of selected documents
   - Previously: Only top 5 chunks retrieved across all documents
   - Now: Retrieves \(5 * num_documents\) chunks to ensure coverage
   - This ensures queries about "all documents" actually use all documents

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
